resources.string: Why do I need to allow camera permissions?

If you’d like to scan a landmark with your camera, it is mandatory that you allow our application to use your device’s camera. 

The camera will only be accessed when you’re about to take a picture, you can revoke this access anytime in your device’s settings. 

More information:
Does this app require internet connection?
Yes, it does. \nThe application will access the internet for landmark scanning feature and data fetching for landmarks information and media files.
You need to allow camera permission to use the scanning feature.
